author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Shower valve tile tips…templates help a lot. I cut a piece of KERDI-BOARD to match the valve diameter. I used it to trace the valve location onto the tile. Then I cut slivers using the IQ saw and refined the cut with a chamfer cone. Remember, if you’re tiling a shower and want beautiful results join our Video Library at homerepairtutor.com 👍🏽🔥#tileshower #bathroomremodel #diy
title: Shower Valve Tile Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor #diy
